<s> In this regard , I think that it would be particularly interesting and relevant to deal with the business world . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the one hand , I tend to think that an employee deserves the right to be considered as a successful person to the extent that they previously had to prove educated and motivated enough to meet the employer 's requirements for a specific position within a company . <\s>
<s> As a matter of fact , given the level of selection regarding a position of teacher in macroeconomics , I argue that the status of successful person is not to be neglected . <\s>
<s> However , I want to highlight the fact that the applicant is all the more granted recognition in the way that their knowledge is not sufficient in these situations ; indeed , not only is the applicant 's academic background important in the hiring process , but the ability to teach to a given category of students is also to be considered . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , I also think that we could consider the concept of being succesful from a different point of view . <\s>
<s> Indeed , I also agree with the argument according to which successful people try new things and take risk . <\s>
<s> For instance , the latter qualities could enable people to evolve in a company ; why would we have to restrain ourselves while we could take advantage of external opportunities to improve in particular fields . <\s>

<s> You must know the basic ideas and concepts . <\s>
<s> Let 's take an example : the war in the Middle East , to get your own opinion on this issue you must know what has been going on there , you have to understand the concepts and ideas of the area . <\s>
<s> Another example could be found in economics , you have to understand how a company works in order to manage it well . <\s>

<s> when one weigh the pros and cons of using a car , it will lead to an inevitable conclusion : in twenty years car will become a kind of ` endangered species ' in our modern society . <\s>
<s> Currently , this question is raising a huge controversy because , on the one hand , car is widely used as a traditional means of transportation and cars are also a part of our cultur [ especially , in the US , where car drivers are totally enamored with their cars ] . <\s>
<s> But on the other hand , the increasingly price of petroleum and fossil fuels , the environmental issues linked to the widespred use of cars and other drawbacks make people think more deeply about cars . <\s>
<s> As a matter of fact , I maintain that cars are going to disappear in a very close future , mainly because of economic reasons and environmental issue . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First and foremost , people are more and more concerned about the sharp growth of their expenses . <\s>
<s> Using a car involves a lot of shortcoming since it is very expensive to purchase a car , to buy oil and to ensure your car , for instance . <\s>
<s> So it seems that cars tend to become less available for the middle class families in developped countries . <\s>
<s> Besides , one should bear in mind that it is not so comfortable to use a car because you have to endure traffic jams , which may end in traffic accidents sometimes , you have to commute every day and I strongly believe that people are fed up with such problems . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Moreover , cars will be fewer used in the next years because people are well aware that it is damaging to the environmemt and the nature around them . <\s>
<s> Obviously , one should not expect modern human to renounce technological progress or to return to the Stone Age . <\s>
<s> But , if things are left as they are , the human specie will finaly disappear . <\s>
<s> Thus , I am sure that one should prefere rescue our planet and lives of next generation rather than keeping his car . <\s>
<s> That is all the more crucial that the situation is obviously getting worse , so i cannot help thinking that men are able to make sacrificies if it is worth it . <\s>
<s> Similary , we can see the harmfull impact of cars in our daily life . <\s>
<s> In big cities there a lot of exhaust fumes , a lot of noise , smog and pollution and , to my mind citizens will not stand it any longer . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Finally , the developpement of alternative ways of transportation will also lead to a fewer use of cars . <\s>
<s> For instance , a mayor in a big town can decide to increse the public transportation network , to make it more convenient and available in order to replace cars . <\s>
<s> That is what happened in Paris recently . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> To conclude , eventhough a lot of people are still addicted to their cars , they will soon change their mind . <\s>

<s> I think that in twenty years there will actually be fewer cars than there are now . <\s>
<s> In this essay , I will explain the reasons why i think this will happen . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The main reason for my views is the increasing price of gas . <\s>
<s> We have seen that the petrolium prices have gone through the roof recently . <\s>
<s> In the last three years , they have more than doubled . <\s>
<s> The fuel efficieny of cars has more or less been stagnant in the last couple of decades . <\s>
<s> It is reasonable to assume fuel efficiency will not be able to offset the rising prices . <\s>
<s> At this rate , it will be prohibitively expensive to drive a car , and people will prefer public modes of transport such as buses and metros . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Another reason is that more and more people are becoming aware of the pollution caused by cars . <\s>
<s> People are increasingly concerned about their environment , and are taking steps to maintain it . <\s>
<s> In Denmark for example , an increasing number of people are using bicycles rather than cars . <\s>
<s> Taking a cue , other Europeans have started adopting these steps . <\s>
<s> This trend is likely to spread well beyond Europe , into America and other continents . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Cars make people lazy . <\s>
<s> As people become more health conscious , they will stop using cars , and use more healthy ways of transport such as cycling or biking . <\s>
<s> They may also prefer to walk if the distance is short . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> With the advances in aviation industry , it is becoming increasingly affordable to travel by air . <\s>
<s> If we can extrapolate this , travel by air may in fact become cheaper than travel by cars in another twenty years . <\s>
<s> In that case people are highly likely to stop using cars . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , it is more likely than not that there will be fewer cars twenty years from now . <\s>
<s> This is supported by present conditions as well as past experience . <\s>
<s> In general I support the idea that successful people try new things and take risks rather than doing things they already know . <\s>
<s> To support this statement you first have to look at the reasons why people become successful in the first place . <\s>
<s> You also have to have a look at the word successful and to evaluate its definition . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Successful people - usually we are thinking of people who are successful in more than one aspect of life , e.g. work , family , sports ... <\s>
<s> We consider them to be above average . <\s>
<s> But what do you have to do to become above average ? <\s>
<s> It requires you to go a step further when other people stop , or to use ways and means that nobody has used before you . <\s>
<s> A successful scientist , for example , has to abandon worn out paths and try something new , look in a direction that noone has looked before or exploit a field that has been considered as irrelevant . <\s>
<s> By this he moves himself on a brink , because leaving the standard routes always implies the possibility of failure . <\s>
<s> A manager who has the reputation for being able to fix unsuccessful enterprises had to do the unusual to stand out of the row of managers before him , who all but failed . <\s>
<s> However , to reach true excellency you have to take risks and do something new - otherwise you will remain average . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Additionally , if you are already successul you have the monetary or social background that you can risk something without gambling with your bare existence . <\s>

<s> I disagree with the claim that the best way to travel is in a group lead by a tour guide . <\s>
<s> Since traveling is often for leisure and entertainment , traveling in a group with a tourn guide would restrict my individual interests , my pace , and the intimacy of the group dynamic . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First , traveling is supposed to be enjoyable for the tourists . <\s>
<s> Although a tour guide may be able to lead the group toward the major and well-known attractions , in his or her attempt to appeal to the majority of the tourists , many tourists ' individual interests may be compromised . <\s>
<s> For instance , if the town is internationally famous for its wine but also has a nice but small museum of WWI artifacts , the tour guide is most likely going to focus on wine tasting rather than the historical artifacts . <\s>
<s> However , one of the tourists in the group may be a history buff and is hoping to expand his collection of WWI artifacts , he or she may miss out on the opportunity of a lifetime conforming to group interests . <\s>
<s> Thus , in many such cases , traveling is better done individually or in a small group of friends rather than in a group led by a tourn guide . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Also , traveling is a chance to only to see and experiences new things but also to unwind . <\s>
<s> Thus , the pace offered by a tour guide may restrict one 's ability to relax . <\s>
<s> For instance , in a tour group , there may be people of all ages groups . <\s>
<s> Typically , the younger tourists would be more energetic , attempting to see everything and speeding up the group 's pace . <\s>
<s> However , the older people in the group may just be hoping to relax and enjoy the view at few select locations . <\s>
<s> Thus , the disparity between the goals and pace of the tourists in the group may restrict many 's traveling experience and may even be the cause of additional stress . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Finally , much intimacy and freedom is loss when traveling in group led by a tour guide . <\s>
<s> Since tour groups are usually composed of random people across the nation , or even across the world , it may be difficult to feel comfortable in their presence . <\s>
<s> Also , when traveling in such a large and unfamiliar group , freedom of speech and behavior is lost . <\s>
<s> For instance , with adults around , teengers wo n't be able to blast the music they love on the radio and with the children around , the adults wo n't be able to talk about many of the personal details of their life . <\s>
<s> Conversation tend to become more superficial and restricted . <\s>
<s> Hence , in many cases , traveling in such a group led by a tour guide is not the best choice . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Thus , I disagree with the statement that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide . <\s>
<s> With restricted interest , pace , and freedom , I would not have a good traveling experience and I think many would feel the same way . <\s>

<s> Do the companies prefer their product to be presented in a way better than they really are ? <\s>
<s> Unfortunately , yes they do . <\s>

<s>  <\s>

<s> That is why they give money to advertisement makers , hoping that after this campaign there will be a dramatic increase in the profit of the company . <\s>
<s> Moreover , some companies prefer to give advertisements before a new product is out for sale . <\s>
<s> Due to the fact that no one has ever seen it , they can manuplate the appearance of the product such that it will look perfectly and be more prone to be bought . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Secondly , a company might plan giving advertisements on products which have a lower selling rate recently . <\s>
<s> For instance , if a shampoo is not selling enough , the company agrees with a very well known artist or popstar for showing up in an ad and saying `` I am also using this shampoo , if you want to have as beautiful hair as mine you should also use this . '' <\s>

<s> Nevertheless , they have a tendency and temptation to buy it . <\s>

<s> On the other hand , if they show us the picture of the product prr to being sold in the market , most probably people will not buy it . <\s>

<s> As a conclusion , being trustwothy in giving advertisements is not a required behaviour in the area of business . <\s>

<s> For me , the main purpuse of an advertisement is to show a product to someone ( a person , a group of people , a company , etc ) in order to sell it to the person . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> So what other way to sell a product than show it the best way possible . <\s>
<s> And if the product is not so good or not that good looking , the only way to convince the audience that this product is worth buying is by showing it a tiny bit better than it really is in fact . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> A great example that I have in mind to illustrate this , is the following one : When you are waiting in a fast food , restaurent and you are looking at the pictures of the food you are about to order , you always see all the french fries lined-up and '' facing '' you . <\s>
<s> You always see the food displayed in those posters in a way that you have never seen it on your table . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The reason food is more attractive on the posters is that the servers , would not have time to re-arrange every french fry in order before you eat it . <\s>
<s> And of course , there is no way that a fast food brand displays it 's fries just like it is in real life , because nobody would order it . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Some might say that if the product is really good , there is no need to make it seem better than it actually is . <\s>
<s> And again , this is usually wrong . <\s>
<s> Let 's take for example a big brand . <\s>

<s> Nowadays many people look for ways in order to decrease the number of cars in use . <\s>
<s> Although I would like to see that quantity of automobiles on decreases , I do not believe that this is a possible trend for the near future . <\s>
<s> Simply speaking , there are more incentives for people to buy and use cars than there are reasons to abandon them . <\s>
<s> I will try to make a short list of these incentives . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First of all , the population on earth is growing continuously , which means that there are many new people who want to have cars . <\s>
<s> As a result of huge advertising campaigns carried out by automobile firms which want to maximize their profits , a social image has been created for cars . <\s>
<s> People now think that a car improves their mobility and is an indicator of their socio-economic status . <\s>
<s> Moreover , young people also want to have their own cars , which makes them `` cool '' . <\s>
<s> As a result , the demand for new cars is very high in almost every country on teh world . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Another trend which would avoid a decrease in the number of cars is the unpopularity of mass transit systems . <\s>
<s> Since the cities are growing constantly and funds of governments and local administration cannot grow as rapidly as cities , it becomes harder to travel within the city using the overcrowded mass transit systems . <\s>
<s> Therefore , many people prefer to have a car and use it especially in the busy hours of the day . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Due to the fascinating technological advancements , it becomes easier for people to buy a new car , because technological advancements enable a decrease in prices . <\s>
<s> Bank credits and other kinds of financial assistance are offered to people who want to have cars and most people use these opportunities to have a new car and keeping the older one for other members of the family . <\s>
<s> In the early 21st century , it is now widely accepted that a nuclear family has more than one car , sometimes even all members have their own car : Another inclination which hardens a worldwide decrease in the number of cars . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The continuous growth of population coupled with the strong social image of automobiles , unpopularity of mass transit systems and price decreases indicate that a decrease in the quantity of automobiles is not possible for the near future . <\s>
<s> Considering the environmental dangers of having moer cars , on the other hand , governmental and non-governmental organizations should seek and promote options other than cars . <\s>
<s> As much as I wish for it to be true for the sake of the environment and the future of of our ecological system , I have a hard time agreeing with the statement : `` in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use that there are today . '' <\s>
<s> Ever since the introduction of the `` T-Model '' by Henry Ford using mass production technologies in the 1920's , the number of cars has started to increase in exponential factors . <\s>
<s> This is due to a number of factors which I believe are irrevocable in our modern day world . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Firstly , our technology is changing at such a fast pace that we do not know if and how to tame it . <\s>
<s> Thus , it is becoming ever easier to design and manufacture cars . <\s>

<s> There is wide range of cars available for sorts of tastes and budgets . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Secondly , as the world economy progresses , the purchasing power of nations and individuals increase although not at the same rate . <\s>
<s> For example , even though let us say that some 3rd world countries are not as rich as their European or North American counterparts , the streets are jammed with cars in capitals of India , Egypt , etc . <\s>
<s> Cars are becoming more and more accessible in the remotest and the most impoverished locations . <\s>
<s> Whereas it was not easy for a young woman from Kazakhistan to own her own car , it is not as unthinkable today as it once was . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Lastly , I believe that we , as individuals , are becoming more and more addicted to our cars . <\s>
<s> Whereas a household used to have one car in the 1970's or so , now the number of cars per household is increasing rapidly . <\s>
<s> This is in part necessitated by the rapid and hectic lifestyles brought about by the modern world and in part by what we call `` conspicious consumption '' in economics . <\s>
<s> If your neighbour changes to a better version , you like to do the same due to psychological factors even though your current car may be perfectly functional and comfortable . <\s>
<s> This naturally `` drives up '' the market for cars . <\s>

<s> Our daily routines are completely disturbed if we have to go to the office without our car . <\s>

<s> This helped the founders of Google to become two of the richtest people in the world in a remarkably short period of time . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In its frequent advertising campaigns , McDonalds claims that its products are not only delicious but also very healthy . <\s>
<s> Scientic studies , however , have found that the so-called ` fast food culture ' is one of the most significant reasons for the enourmous increase in overweighted people in the United States . <\s>
<s> Unfortunately , many people are not aware this is not only a problem for the individuals themselves but will also have devastating effects on society as a whole , given the large amount of health costs these people will produce . <\s>

<s> Many large investment bank promise prospective clients less risk or higher returns that can be achieved by investing in secure assets like government bonds . <\s>
<s> However , the burst of the internet bubble in the year 2000 and the subsequent bear market in stocks has shown that none of those high-profile financial instituions was able to life up to their promises . <\s>

<s> The purpose of advertisements is to present a product or service in such a way that the consumers would want to have it , and have it immediately . <\s>
<s> Accordingly most advertisements would make the products seem much better than they really are . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> There are thousands and thousands of products and services being promoted in advertisements . <\s>
<s> However not all commodities and services are needed by the consumers , at least not all of them . <\s>
<s> But advertisements will be presented in all media like newspaper , TV commercials , street signs as if it is for all mankind . <\s>
<s> All the advantages of a product are being highlighted , whereas nothing will be mentioned about the weaknesses , which definitely would exist . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> For example , insurance company 's selling piont is the efficiency and complete service whenever there is a claim after a car accident . <\s>
<s> But in reality , there are always complicated paperwork to complete and a long process for the claim to be approved . <\s>
<s> Sometimes a client has to go to different departments and doctors ' offices to get verification . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The promotion of a soft-drink will also emphasis how good it is to a thirsty person and meet needs for energy , etc. whereas how soon a person would get thirsty again and the side effect will not be mentioned at all . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Some commercials will do comparision between one product with another brand . <\s>
<s> For instance , laundry powder that would clear stains of all kinds totally and quickly , whereas the type from another manufacturer will not do the same good job . <\s>
<s> But they would not let the consumers know exactly how the experiments was conducted . <\s>

<s> A very common question posed by students revolves around what it is better , either having a broad knowledge of many academic subjects or specializing in one specific subject ? <\s>
<s> Grounds can be held to support any of the two possible answers . <\s>
<s> In fact , both have advantages and disadvantages , but as far as I am concerned , to specialize in a single field seems to be the right answer . <\s>
<s> I will give three reasons to back up my choice . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First af all , it seems undeniable that nowadays the labor market is demanding for very young and capable employees , usually already holding a Master 's degree . <\s>
<s> Neither this young people nor the educational system can disregard this fact , and the Universities must encourage their students to specialize and focus specifically on certain and well-defined subjects . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Moreover , we have to put special emphasis in the fact that recent psychological researches are showing that acquiring expertise on a specific field of knowledge , is a way for people to feel fully happy with themselves . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> A third point refers to the fact that studying a subject seriously and at great length takes a great deal of time , and makes it very difficult to deep in any other subjects . <\s>
<s> We do not want our students to become second-rate proffessionals in their careers . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> To sum up , given the current expectations on the entrepreneurs ' part and thus , in the labor market , it is important for society in general and for academia in particular facing up to reality and encourage the students to follow the right direction : specialization . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Nevertheless , arguments holding the other way round , that is , the importance of acquire a broad knowledge of many academic subjects cannot be completely swept aside either . <\s>
<s> In my book , well-educated people need to have a very high level of acquaintance of a certain field ( law , science , literature , etc. ) , but at the same time , it is very satisfactory to devote some time to different activities ( cultural activities , sports , and so forth and so on ) . <\s>

<s> In the meantime , their price will continue rising as it already does . <\s>

<s> Furthermore , global warming is now being faced as a real issue for our planet , and fuel consumption by cars largely contributes to it . <\s>
<s> Some governments are already raising taxes on gas , in order to make people reduce their use of cars . <\s>
<s> They also encourage public transport : 30 people in a bus represent a much smaller impact on environment than 30 people in their own cars . <\s>

<s> Technologies are being developed which will allow cars to be cleaner for the environment . <\s>

<s> However , although there are a vast number of cars in our world , I think that they will start to decrease in a few decades . <\s>
<s> I believe that in twenty years , by the decrease in the amount of petroleum , and by technological improvements that will enable us to travel longer distances in cheaper costs , the number of cars will decrease dramatically . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Petroleum is the main natural resource that is used as the fuel for cars . <\s>
<s> However , because of the huge consumption of this natural resource , it was greatly reduced . <\s>
<s> After twenty years , the petroleum that is left will not fulfill the needs of overpopulated people in cities . <\s>
<s> Because of that , petroleum prices will be much higher , and the people will have to think twice before purchasing a car . <\s>
<s> For example , because the gas prices are more than people can afford in Turkey , people prefer travelling short distances by foot , and large distances by busses , which are considerably cheaper than using owned cars . <\s>
<s> Because of that , the number of cars decreased considerably . <\s>
<s> Therefore , because petroleum is a natural resource that is decreasing constantly , in twenty years , people will use other ways to travel , instead of cars . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Moreover , thanks to the technological improvements , new transportation devices , which are more convinient , are used . <\s>
<s> Years after years , devices that enable quicker mass transportation have been made . <\s>
<s> For example , the usage of the underground travel system , namely metro , has increased in all around England . <\s>
<s> Because of the traffic caused by the high population of cars , metros superceded cars in England . <\s>
<s> In twenty years , this new method of travelling will be widespread in the entire world , and , as a result , there will be fewer cars used for travelling . <\s>
<s>  <\s>

<s>  <\s>
<s> As for a student to learn a fact , all he has to do is to memorise it . <\s>
<s> Memorising something without understanding it will lead to forgetting this fact as soon as _or shortly after _ the stimulus for memorising it is over . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Facts are only memorised and stored in the long term memory if they are constantly used in everyday life . <\s>
<s> For example when a medical student has to memorise all different types of drugs . <\s>
<s> If this student was n't asked about these drugs in every morning rounds , where he had to revise them everytime he made a mistake , he would otherwise forget them . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , understanding the subject makes it easier to remember . <\s>
<s> For example when the same medical student has to memorise some information about the physiology of the human body . <\s>
<s> he can understand it once , and answer any questions related to this topic years after he had studied it . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> This is why i prefer understanding the topic over learning the facts . <\s>
<s> As the facts are easily lost over the years and what remains is what we understand of that particular subject . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Understanding the ideas and concepts requires far more work and processing by the student than only memorising the facts . <\s>
<s> So it is always up to the student at the end to choose between understanding and memorising . <\s>

<s> When learning a specific subject in school , students are required not only to know the information regarding the subject but also to understand the concepts implied . <\s>
<s> These two aspects are very differnt and require differnt abilities from students . <\s>
<s> Though it is important to know the facts for a subject , it is more important for a student to understand the ideas and concepts in order to have a thourough understanding of the topic . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First of all , simply memorizing facts does not imply knowing the topic . <\s>
<s> If a student does so , she is just regurgitating what she has read or heard which does n't mean she knows what she has learned . <\s>
<s> On the other hand if a studen understands the concepts and ideas related to the topic , then he understands the implications as well as the uses of the topic . <\s>
<s> For example in History , though it is often precieved as a subject which merely requires memorizing , a student needs to understand the concepts in order to full appreciate the subject . <\s>
<s> Merely memorizing dates and occurences does not offer real insight as to why certain events occur and what effects these events could have on our present society . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Furthermore , understanding concepts as opposed to just learning facts allows a student to deal with any type of question . <\s>
<s> A student that has only learned facts will be expecting questions that ask him to answer with the facts he has learned . <\s>
<s> If a question deals with a deviation of these facts , then the student would not be able to adequatly ansewer the question . <\s>
<s> A student on the other hand , who understands the concepts implied would be able to use her procces of induction and deduction to come to logical answer . <\s>
<s> I , personaly , have come across such dilema in a physics test . <\s>
<s> The question I found on the test , dealt with a concept that we had not read or discussed previously in class . <\s>
<s> Fortunatly , I had a good understanding of the concepts and ideas involved wich allowed me to derive the appropriate formula that was required for the test . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Finally , understanding concepts and ideas , allows a student to retain the subject and topic for a longer time . <\s>
<s> A student who memorizes facts is more likely to forget these once the test or examination is finished , so that the knowledge is thus not aquired . <\s>
<s> For a student who does understand the concepts , though she may forget the facts in the future , but she will still be able to think the process logicaly and come to a conclusion that would be adequate . <\s>

<s> I do n't agree the idea that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts . <\s>
<s> From my point of view , understanding the ideas and concepts and learning the facts have equal importance because at first without facts ideas and concepts ca n't be understood . <\s>
<s> Let me explain this with a personal experience , I 'm studying textile engineering at university , in all classes our lecturers tell us the facts about textile materials and the facts about how they are produced . <\s>
<s> And then we argue on how we can improve the material qualities and production techniques and in the end of the lesson lecturer gives his/her ideas about them . <\s>
<s> By this way we learn the facts about the materials and production techniques and understands the ideas and concepts about improving them even we can create our own ideas . <\s>
<s> But if we do n't clearly know what the features of the textile material are and how it 's produced we can neither understand the ideas of the lecturer about improving them nor create our own ideas . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Secondly , if you both know the facts and understand the ideas and concepts about a certain topic then you totaly know the topic . <\s>
<s> For example in an arts class if some examples of drawings of Leonardo Da Vinci are shown and the dates of them are given , it 's good you have seen how Leonardo Da Vinci 's paintings look like . <\s>
<s> But what about the idea behind these drawings ? <\s>
<s> If the lecturer tells you his/her opinions about what he might think while making these drawings or encourages you to imagine Leonardo 's mood while making these drawings then you can have a total knowledge about Leonardo Da Vinci 's art . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion in order to gain the exact knowledge of a certain topic at first students should learn facts and then understand ideas and concepts . <\s>
<s> Education system should be organized according to this logic from primary school to university in order to raise well educated and intellectual students . <\s>

<s> Many people believe that young people enjoy life to a higher degree than older people do . <\s>
<s> In my opinion , this is a statement that is not correct since it fundamentally denies the complexity of the issues of joy , life and age and tries to deliver a general and simplified statement . <\s>
<s> In those crucial matters , however , I believe that trying to make a general point is not helpful in any way . <\s>
<s> Therefore , I disagree with that statement , both because of its content and because of the way the content is delivered , namely through generality . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First of all , it is certainly a question of the perspective from which one looks at to what degree people enjoy life . <\s>
<s> Young people might believe that older people enjoy life less because of their decreasing health conditions or because of the decay of their outward appearence whereas older people might be of the opinion that it is the youth that enjoys life less since , being at an early stage of life , they still have all the hardships of life in front of them . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In this connection , it is certainly a question of definition what it means to `` enjoy life '' . <\s>
<s> There is no such thing as a scale measuring the joy in life that valid for every person , and there is no need to create such scale . <\s>
<s> Everyone has a different view on life and different expectations that contributed to joyful life . <\s>
<s> Some people enjoy life doing sports , others enjoy life by achieving financial success . <\s>
<s> That feeling is not objective but rather subjective and it is not possible to really compare those individual feelings . <\s>
<s> Different people have different priorities in life . <\s>
<s> Thus , trying to decide whether younger people enjoy life more than older people do or vice versa seems impossible since it denies the very individual character traits , opinions and views that one holds . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In my opinion , it is a question of how old one really feels . <\s>
<s> As for myself , I know a 73-year-old man who is as active as he could ever be , perfectly indulging in sports everyday by running cross country before breakfast . <\s>
<s> This exemplifies that every individual is as distinctly different from others . <\s>
<s> Therefore , categories of people enjoying life more or less than others do not make any sense . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , I disagree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do , because of the fact that on the one hand , everyone has to define solely for himself or herself what it means to enjoy life . <\s>
<s> Many people might have different points of view on this particular topic based on their personal experiences or their social status . <\s>
<s> Moreover , since the lifespan of human has greatly extended compared to the past due to advanced health care system , it might be even difficult to classify between younger people and older people . <\s>

<s> Having a broad knowledge of many academic subjects without a specific specialization would give one information that is excessive , irrelevant , desultory in nature if it has to be applied to one 's vocation , service , a profession . <\s>
<s> So I would disagree with the pursuit of many fields of study without any subject to specialize in . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> For example , if a student of engineering pursues courses in performing arts , like dance , it might enhance the talent and social value of the person but it would not contribute to his performance in his role as an academician or a professional as an engineer . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Each subject has many specializations within its field . <\s>
<s> Education in itself is expensive . <\s>
<s> Compared to the working population , for various reasons , a relatively smaller percentage of people pursue education after high school , earn a baccalaureate degree and then begin , complete Graduate School also . <\s>
<s> For example , Psychology has other sub-fields of Clinical , Counseling , Education which serve different purposes in helping the recipients of its services . <\s>
<s> Or let 's take the example of a doctor who has taken courses in various subjects rather than emphasizing his learning in surgery , or medicine , or cancer . <\s>
<s> How can he/she help patients to get well with a broad knowledge that covers subjects of political science , medicine , english etc . ? <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> If the schools of higher learning do not build their departments around a particular subject , for example , social work or social policy ; the administration , teaching , evaluation the courses being taught would suffer seriously . <\s>
<s> Till secondary school level , many academic subjects can be learnt and it is good for our general knowledge . <\s>
<s> But as the focus of education shifts to colleges and universities , it makes sense intellectually , practically , knowledge-wise to specialize in one specific subject . <\s>
<s> This would help people to fulfil various roles , perform the services required to have a functional society . <\s>
<s> The society , its educational , social and health systems would be in chaos in the event of a scenario where education would lack focus , training , depth in every particular field of study . <\s>
<s> Having a wide perspective and a broad knowledge in many academic fields is much better and necessary than specializing in a single subject , especially in our modern and diverse societies . <\s>
<s> This necessity becomes much more apperant when one considers social studies . <\s>
<s> Academic work in social fields , because they are mainly dealing with human beings and their actions , unlike engineering , requires a broad understanding of human behaviour in order to make meaningful and accurate assestments of their actions . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Many of the issues that we face today are very much inter-related . <\s>
<s> It is very hard to isolate a single problem from the other and specifically study it without ever engaging its neigboring fields . <\s>
<s> For instance , a sociologist who plans to study the criminal tendency among an specific cultural group must not only have information about the history of these people , but must also have an adequate amount of knowledge about how economic conditions which might influence human behaviour should be interpreted . <\s>
<s> Moreover , she must have a knowledge of interpreting economical data , which would also necessiate a minimum level knowledge of statistical data . <\s>
<s> Hence , as illustrated above , a study on criminal tendency would at least necessiate knowledge of history , economics and statistics . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Another difficulty with focusing in one specific subject is that it narrows your perspective and may result in disorientation regarding the place that the specific subject occupies within the general picture . <\s>
<s> Every social event , apart from its internal structure or working , is also interacting with other parts of the social field in an active way . <\s>
<s> Therefore , many times in order to get a meaningful analysis of the particular social structure that one is analyzing , it should be placed within a wider context and interpreted within the light that the context sheds on it . <\s>
<s> Without this broader outlook , it is possible to fall into many cliches and misinterpret a social structure . <\s>
<s> For instance , some practices concerning woman in many eastern cultures might seem oppressive to a western academic , if she only focuses on that specific practice . <\s>
<s> However , a broader perspective which puts that social practice within the context , for example a religious context , could make it much more understandable . <\s>
<s> The act which seems oppressive might be reinterpreted as based on the consent of woman , and therefore not constituting a form of power relation . <\s>
<s> Therefore , putting things in context and looking at them from a wider perspective would yield to better results . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> We are living in an increasingly diverse societies and it is much more easier for different people to interact with each other due to the advencements in information technologies . <\s>
<s> Within this diverse world , any academic who takes interest only at a single specific field would be lacking the necessary tools for producing meaningful analysis of society . <\s>
<s> Therefore , what the modern world needs is academics who are trained in different fields and academics who can put together information from different fields into meaningful wholes . <\s>
<s> The issue about whether understanding ideas is more important than learning facts is a complex one . <\s>
<s> Personally , I am convinced that facts are less important than ideas . <\s>
<s> In the following paragraphs I will try to explain the reason why I believe this . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First , understanding ideas is more difficult than merely memorizing facts . <\s>
<s> Even a little child can memorize dates , names of famous battles , names of kings etc . <\s>
<s> But it takes much more effort to understand the ideas and the implications behind these facts . <\s>
<s> Take for example the French Revolution . <\s>
<s> Anyone can memorize the year : 1789 . <\s>
<s> But understanding the far-reaching outcome of it is a much more complex issue ! <\s>
<s> The french revolution 's results can still be observed in the world we are living right now , where governments rely on democracy rather than monarchy . <\s>
<s> While remembering a date is something anyone could do , performing a profound analysis on the plethora of causes and the multitude of effects of such an important event is not so easy . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The second point I would like to stress is that learning facts is not so useful in everyday life as it is understanding concepts . <\s>
<s> What I mean by this is : what is the point of learning the exact year of a battle or the death of an important person ? <\s>
<s> It might only come useful when being on a TV quiz show or when playing `` Trivial Pursuit '' . <\s>
<s> Instead , delving into the causes , the effects and the main idea behind it , can prove useful . <\s>
<s> Understanding the main idea that lies behind a fact can help someone obtain precious insight on very important issues like , for example , human nature . <\s>
<s> Many antropological studies in fact , rely on histrorical events when trying to explain human behaviour . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> To summarize , I believe that ideas are more relevant than facts when it comes to studies and that the universities should be more focused on having students understanding ideas and concepts behind a fact , rather that the fact itself . <\s>

<s> A younger body also implies a mind that is yet to develop to its full potential . <\s>
<s> Despite the physical crutches that age may come with , it remains a magnificent process of learning and developing as an individual . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> It is said that with age comes experience . <\s>
<s> The experience of years past allows an individual to view situations differently . <\s>
<s> The reaction of a 6 year old on getting his first cycle might seem more jubilant than that of his grandfather but the quite pride of watching his grandson gleam with pleasure , speaks of the hard work and commitment that the wrinkled face one sees has learn to put in , to give others such joy . <\s>

<s> Whlist she did n't want to b the first to aplogise , she still spent the day in a foul mood waiting for Ayesha to initiate the peace making process . <\s>

<s> Although students in the same class take same courses under identical circumstances in terms of instructor , teaching aids and experience , and assigned textbooks , two groups of students may arise after that course . <\s>
<s> During and after the course , some students will focus on understanding ideas and concepts , while others will be content of accepting absolute facts undoubtly . <\s>
<s> I belong to the first type of students , and hence I strongly agree with the statement . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> When you take a course , whether it is at university or school , with intention in your mind to just receive passively new facts then to ga back home , then allow me to tell you that you are missing the point ! <\s>
<s> Students who want the instructor to merely plug in data and information into their brains in class , with no deep and profound interest in the topic , are on their way to become dummy as machines . <\s>
<s> They will never raise relevant questions in lectures nor participate actively in any class discussion . <\s>
<s> This , in effect , will lead them to the what so-called cramming . <\s>
<s> Exam crammers may enjoy good results , in some situations , for a while , but they will regret it in the soon future . <\s>
<s> I believe that learning is about understanding new material , questioning results and facts , knowing how things work or why they are the way they are , then moving to your own conclusions and evaluation . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , if your purpose of taking any course is to comprehend it to the most , then you are on the right track . <\s>
<s> Students who dive into this deeper level of understanding will excell , not only in academic life , but also in the professional one . <\s>
<s> Thorough examination of the topic you are studying will get you beyond mathematical equations , if you are studying technology , or beyond clusters of words and paragraphs if you deal with literature . <\s>
<s> Information will make much more sense to your mind , and you will feel the real power of knowledge when you study in order to understand , not just to pass the next exam . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , understanding the underlying concepts and definitions behind any learning topic is more solid and lasting than going through facts quickly . <\s>
<s> The benefits are promising and will become more evident in the students future . <\s>

<s> One basic principle is the one of giving and receiving . <\s>
<s> `` You get as much as you give ! '' <\s>

<s> If the answer to this question is negative we tend no to do it even if the moralicly correct decision would be differently . <\s>

<s> Maybe we should consider the aspect of love for others - even with the image of an egotistic youth ? <\s>

<s>  <\s>

<s> Finally I suggest to make clear to young people that giving some of their expensive time to the community they receive even more than expected . <\s>
<s> And that in the end this moral and communital behaviour can turn out to be very lucrative for everyone ! <\s>

<s> Consider IBM 's System / 360 family of computes introduced in 1964 . <\s>
<s> It was intended as replacement for the series 1400 business computers and series 7000 academic computers . <\s>
<s> Until then , IBM had been selling two inherently incompatible classes of computers meaning that it have to give different training for each type of computer and also that parts and accessories were not compatible . <\s>
<s> The S / 360 was designed to address both commercial and academic requirements , making it the all round computer , which is why it was named after the 360 degrees of a complete circle . <\s>
<s> Furthermore , upgrading from a small computer to a bigger one meant that all of the programs had to be written again . <\s>
<s> The S / 360 made it possible for customers to start with a small computer and gradually upgrade to more powerful computers , protecting their investment all the way . <\s>
<s> It was a very risky move for IBM but it worked and made IBM the leader of the industry . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Others were not as lucky as IBM was . <\s>
<s> Steve Jobs , the man who pioneered personal computers , was so impressed with research in Xerox Parc that he built the world 's first GUI * Graph'cal User Interface ( personal computer . <\s>
<s> The ` Lisa ' had windows , menus and all the features of a user friendy interface that has become prolific with the spread of Windows . <\s>
<s> However it also had a price tag of around $ 10,000 and it failed miserably . <\s>
<s> Steve Jobs went ahead and built another GUI computer which he called the Macintosh . <\s>
<s> That was juch cheaper but made no pretence to being compatible with the IBM PC . <\s>
<s> Once again Jobs had taken a risk and failed to succeed . <\s>
<s> It would appear that taking risks is necessary for success but it is also dangerous . <\s>

<s> The purpose of advertising a product is to make it known to the public , to claim its benefits and to induce potential customers to buy the product . <\s>
<s> Advertisements come in different forms and through different media : TV , radio , Internet , posters on streets , displays in stores and hand-outs in public spaces . <\s>
<s> Furthermore , advertisments can be targeted to a specific group of people ( women , children , elderly ) or can interest the entire population . <\s>
<s> Whatever the means of the advertisement , an ad wants to convey a certain image and to convince people through wise usage of colors , words , shapes , sizes and people used in the ad . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> With my definition of advertisment , I agree with the statement saying that `` most advertisments make products seem much better than they really are '' . <\s>
<s> Advertisements usually only display the advantages and upsides of a product or service , and do not show its flaws . <\s>
<s> Even if the product or service does not have any faults , it will mos probably be shown in its best or even enhancing light in the ad . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> An example that I often encounter is advertisements for low cost flights . <\s>
<s> Web-sites and and airlines companies often advertise very low flight ticket prices . <\s>
<s> However , the price is never what it is claimed to be . <\s>
<s> The prices advertised always omit fuel and tax surcharges , are restricted to specific dates - on which most people do not wish to fly , and often do not allow passengers to travel with luggage without extra costs . <\s>
<s> So even though low cost tickets may seem attractive , they often end up costing the same amount of money as other tickets once everything is paid for . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Another good example constitutes fad diets . <\s>
<s> Fad diets are popular diets , followed by many men and women in the US , and are usually advertised through books , TV ads and Internet pop-ups . <\s>
<s> Fad diets show healthy and smiling people eating whatever the diet prescribes and losing weight over short periods of time . <\s>
<s> The ads however do not describe how difficult it actually is to follow that diet , how painful it may be and how easy it is to re-gain the weight just lost . <\s>
<s> They do not either display how expensive the diet is and often do not warn od secondary effects , such as depression , self-image troubles and eating disorders . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Consequentially , I concur that advertisements are misleading and do not convey the real value of the product or service advertised . <\s>
<s> Even though there is an increasing number of regulations to stop advertisers from lying in ads , customers keep on being lurred by the shining image that ads give of certain products . <\s>
<s> Today the most challenging area in the business sector is ` marketing` , which is how to advertise your product so that it will flourish among the competitive products and then be sold , As the challenge increases , the main actors in the sector try to come up with innovative ideas in order to survive in this cruel world of business . <\s>
<s> These main actors are advertisers , who actually present the product to the comment of the buyer , Through a considerable amount of time , enery and money spent on the analysis of the sector eventually has begined to create its ` own ' marketing strategies , The most tricky and throuhly successful strategy is to introduce an advertisements that make products seem much better than they really are , This method of ` diguise ' brings one of the hottest issue in the sector : Violation of the ethical considerations , Some advertisers and the companies who hire them think that there cannot be any rules for this game , They claim that they do not insist on the customers to buy the product that is advertised with having told that it has the best feauters compared to similar products , So it is up to the customers whether to choose buying the product or not , On the other hand , some companies emphasize the importance of the some set of ethical values that set the sector in a balance so that it will last , Among these two different perspectives , I think the exclusion of ethical considerations would not harm the sector or the so-called balanced , <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Now , it would be beneficial to grasp an example and see how the two different approaches handle the case . <\s>
<s> Soap is an important product in the FCGM ( Food and Consuption Goods Market ) and probably we are encountering dozens of advertisements on how well ` their ' soaps are , Before going any further , it is incredibally crucial to state the goal of each company regardless of its scale , sector , private or public status : To make profit ; make more money , Remembering this goal , it would be easily concluded that any department in the company seeks to contribute to this profit in a way that department performs , For the marketing department , the way is to advertise the product best so that it will be sold and company will get a profit in return , If you target to make more money , back to example , you have no choise other than selling your soap brand , And if you lack of some quality or price specifications , the only choice to follow is waiting for you : To lie to the buyer ; or in a more kindly way , to exaggregate the features of the products , Any marketing department and advertisers have not the luxury of betraying the ultimate goal of the company . <\s>
<s> So it is extremely logical to exaggregate the features of the products in order to make your products seem much better than they really are when you cannot meet some crucial specifications such as quality which is one of the traits of the prducts customers are seeking to buy , <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , the ethical dimension of the issue is still a big question mark for those who see the ethical and moral values much more prior and important to making profit , <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , it depends on your conscience to lie to your customers or not , I agree that most advertisements make prodcuts seem mcuh better than they really are ; however , due to the reason I stated above , this kind of a marketing strategy just serves to what it is supposed to , If I would be an advertiser and meet a case like this one , I totally go with ` lying to the customer and doing the best for my company` , Besides , I would not be offended as a mere customer and not feel betrayed by the company I trust . <\s>

<s> I disagree with this statement . <\s>

<s> I can conveniently plan my schedule , use my budget more efficiently , and most importantly , learn about the history of the country that I visit . <\s>

<s> Firstly , travelling alone means that I can have a flexible travel plan . <\s>
<s> I can book my own air tickets , reserve my own hotel room , and decide when to visit places . <\s>
<s> But when I am on my own , I do not have to worry about the needs of the others . <\s>
<s> I can choose my time to buy a cheaper air ticket , and rent hotels that appeals to me most . <\s>
<s> I also do not have to visit places that I am not interested in . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Secondly , I can use my budget more efficiently . <\s>
<s> If I am to be led by a tour guide , I will have to pay . <\s>
<s> The fee is usually very expensive and will account for a large part of my travel expenses . <\s>
<s> And since the quality of the service provided by the tour guide is unreliable , I think it is a better idea to spend the money on the travel itself , instead of hiring a tour guide . <\s>
<s> With more money , I can go to more scenic spots and attractions . <\s>
<s> I can also afford to buy more souvenirs , and taste expensive cuisine . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Thirdly , I can fully explore the history of the country that I visit when I travel alone . <\s>
<s> Tour guides only give superficial information about places , and they seldom tell us about the history . <\s>
<s> All they care about catching the coach bus on time , and hurrying places after places . <\s>
<s> When I travel alone , I can talk to the local people , and ask them about the local history . <\s>
<s> This way , I can have a closer look on the historical background of the region , and learn more about its culture . <\s>

<s> I can plan my own schedule , utilise my budget more efficiently , and learn about the history of the country that I visit . <\s>

<s> A guided tour is often part of the former example of travelling ; for one 's pleasure or academic purpose . <\s>
<s> The best way to travel is not in a group led by a tour guide , however ; if I had the choice , I would rather travel alone . <\s>
<s> This is because of freedom that solo travel provides : freedom of planning your own travel , and freedom of avoiding problems caused by other group members . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First , a benifit of travelling alone is that it gives you the freedom to plan your own travel . <\s>
<s> Since you are the only one who ` singed up ' for the tour , you are free to decide on the places you want to go to , when to go there , and what to do when you get there . <\s>
<s> As an example , when I went to Hawaii last summer , I decided to go there on my own , rather than joining a group tour . <\s>
<s> Because of that , I was able to see what I wanted to see ; the beaches to surf , rather than going shopping malls , which the tour focused . <\s>
<s> Also , I was able to pick when I wanted to go , unlike the fixed dates indicated on those tours . <\s>
<s> By travelling alone , I was able to enjoy my stay in Hawaii based on the greater magnitude of freedom I had . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Second , travelling alone gives you an additional degree of freedom since you are free from problems caused by others ; the possible costs I may have to incur due to actions of others . <\s>
<s> Imagine a scenario where I decided to sign up for a group tour to Hawaii . <\s>
<s> The schedule of which plane to take and what time the bus would come and pick me up at Honolulu International has already been planned out . <\s>
<s> But it 's not just my schedule ; it 's the entire group 's schedule . <\s>
<s> Let 's say that several selfish people decided to show up late . <\s>
<s> The whole tour has to suffer from the possible consequences caused by those individuals ; perhaps skiiping an activity we wanted to do or even delaying the trip entirely . <\s>
<s> It would n't make sense if the tour had to give up going to the beach because some individual was taking too long deciding on whether she should get a pink or a white Coach bag . <\s>
<s> By traveling alone , I am able to avoid possible problems caused by irresponsible companions . <\s>

<s> For instance , if a course on 20th century politics forces students to pay their attention only to the major political ideas and concepts in 20th century without presenting any historical development or fact about the era , it can not be fruitful . <\s>

<s> It can become a boring philosophical discussion in the eyes of students , which says nothing about the era 's actual political life . <\s>

<s> Overestimating the importance of learning facts in education process is similarly problematic for students . <\s>
<s> If that course mentioned in the previous paragraph gives only factual information and focuses only on concrete historical developments , it can easily fail explaining the political life of the era . <\s>
<s> Because the ideas and concepts that had major impacts on these concrete developments are inseperable parts of such a course . <\s>
<s> They have a vital role in explaining those events . <\s>
<s> Without them , the course may become simple story sessions in the students ' eyes . <\s>

<s> The students can be able to link all the information they obtain from the course and have a complete picture of the political scene of the era in their minds . <\s>

<s> Moreover , we can reorganize the schedule every time we need , hence we can enjoy the trip more and more . <\s>

<s> Traveling with a guide is usually more expensive than without him and we even need additional money to pay the guide . <\s>

<s> It is a common notion that older people are in greater concern about their own health than younger people , talk about the `` good old times '' and often seem to be skeptical towards changes in lifestyle . <\s>
<s> However , this notion is only a matter of perspective and cannot be generalized that young people enjoy life more than older people do . <\s>
<s> In fact , enjoyment of life is such an individual concept that is impossible to compare the levels of enjoyment among different age groups . <\s>
<s> Who could give an general definition of `` enjoyment '' , let alone some way of measuring the level of it ? <\s>
<s> This , however , would be required before someone can state a different level of enjoying certain things . <\s>
<s> The answer whether there is a difference in the elvel of enjoying life between certain groups of people can only be a balanced one . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The perceived difference in the level of enjoyment lies in the different ways that various people enjoy life . <\s>
<s> A close look at a typical family reunion , e.g. , Thanksgiving , where different age groups of one family get together , reveals that the difference in perceiving joy in life may very well be associated with the age of a certain person . <\s>
<s> While the grandparents may enjoy watching their grandchildren play , younger members of the family might need talking amongst themselves or some other activity to be able to enjoy their time . <\s>
<s> This , of course , cannot be generally said about all families , but certainly a similar case can be constructed from the social network of almost every individual . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Least to say , if young people enjoyed life more than older people , should n't there be some statistical evidence from the social sciences to support that claim ? <\s>
<s> Such a fact would certainly show in many observations , such as happiness surveys , comparisons of the quality of living across regions , or possibly suicide rates . <\s>
<s> Yet there is no numerical evidence to support that assertion . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , while someone might perceive a difference that another person does n't enjoy life as much as the observer does , the only difference lies in the way the enjoyment is felt . <\s>

<s> Such a doctor is better than other general physicians when it comes to heart related ailments . <\s>
<s> Such a specialist is in a better state to advise things related to heart problems . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Additionally , specialization in a subject is better because a specialist can do the research work related to a particular specialized field more effectively and efficiently . <\s>
<s> A research done by a specialist is more credible than a research done by a non-specialist . <\s>
<s> For example , Newton was a specialist in his field , so his research and discoveries are still considered great works in his fields . <\s>
<s> Any one cannot do such a research and lead to great discoveries , but only a specialist like Newton can . <\s>

<s> A Physics professor will be able to teach physics more effectively than any a science teacher who has superficial knowledge about that subject . <\s>

<s> I agree that for students understanding ideas and concepts is more important than learning facts . <\s>
<s> A couple of examples drawn by my own experience convince me of this . <\s>
<s> In school , be it high school or university , students start familiarizing with a broad range of concepts that profoundly influence their ways of thinking and acting . <\s>
<s> Concepts and ideas provide an individual of a young age with a framework for thinking and following a certain methodology . <\s>
<s> For instance , in an art course , a student familiar with the underlying concepts of Cubism will be more able to draw inferences on other works of art of the same period than a student who has focused on the biographical data of an artist or on the names of his works . <\s>
<s> Moreover , the student who master the values who are at the basis of Cubism will be also able to relate them to similar currents of different fields , such as philosophy , literature , music . <\s>
<s> A student who has focused on pure facts could face some problems in linking up several facts if these belongs to different ` realms ' . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Although it is important to have a good knowledge of examples of specific facts or event , it is indispensable to understand concepts and ideas as they provide a good methodology for analyzing and understanding the reality as it appears to us , especially when we have no prior background information to rely on . <\s>
<s> In a media class , understanding which tools are needed to analyze a certain radio show can be useful in the event we have to design the analysis for a totally new media product from scratch , such as a new internet-based application or an upcoming information technology . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Finally , although facts are part of the cultural ` baggage ' everyone uses everyday , can be considered of secondary importance than concepts and ideas which provide the framework for thinking and acting . <\s>

<s> There is some student who prefers to study without understand the principal ideas and concepts of what he is studying , because he thinks that it is unhelpfull or also a waiste of time ; other students , in the opposite way , prefer to pay more attention on the concepts rather than on the mere facts . <\s>
<s> I am in this second group for many reasons , whose the principal ones are three . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The first reason is that I am not so able to study by heart , because of my often failing memory . <\s>
<s> Therefore I prefer to study the logical processes , the reason and the links of different events , rather than the mere facts and information about them . <\s>
<s> For example , studying history , I prefer to learn about the causes of a fact , while it is more difficult to me to study dates or events . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The second reason , that can be linked with the previously one , is that , when a student understands the logical bases and the reasons of various facts , it will become easier to him to learn the facts that derived from that because he make on his brain a logical map of all the arguments he is studying . <\s>
<s> In history , for example , it is helpful to understand what event causes another one , and why ; in this way , it is easier to learn that the first one occurs before the second one , and thus it is easier to learn dates . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The last principal reason that makes me sure about my agreement with the statement is that to understand what a student is studying is more helpfull for him , not only for the graduation , but also and mostly for his life . <\s>
<s> In fact to understand something that also is not interesting improves people 's mind , and we can become smarter . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> To sum up , though somebody thinks that we can learn only the facts from what we are studying , I am sure that it is more important and productive to understand ideas and concepts , and sometime it is also necessary to me ! <\s>

<s> `` Young people enjoy life more than older people do '' - a challenging topic to discuss , but also a question that becomes more and more important . <\s>
<s> Our society , especially the german society , gets older and older . <\s>
<s> Since the birth rate decreases from year to year , we will confront an `` aging '' population in the future . <\s>
<s> In contrast to emerging and growing cultures like the chinese or the indian , we will confront upcoming problems a lot earlier . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> But what defines your ability to enjoy life ? <\s>
<s> Does age actually have an impact on the way you live your own life ? <\s>
<s> Do factors like physical ability , experience and your current situation in life affect your ability to enjoy ? <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Since I am just 22 years of age - I know how much fun it is to be young and how easy it is to enjoy life when there are no physical boundaries or limits . <\s>
<s> You do not confront the boundaries of movement , orientation and sight a 80-year old man would have to live with . <\s>
<s> When you are young , you are at a point of time where you are constantly experiencing new and interesting things . <\s>
<s> And the younger you are , the less you think about the future . <\s>
<s> Everything is taken care of by your elders - you do not need to worry about anything . <\s>
<s> In my opinion this is the perfect base to start an enjoyable life . <\s>
<s> So especially when you are really young , it is a lot easier to enjoy life as it is . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> But what happens when you are growing up ? <\s>
<s> There are many , many events in life that change your current situation dramatically . <\s>
<s> You live in a period of constant change . <\s>
<s> From day to day you are confronted with more and more problems . <\s>
<s> Starting with puberty , life gets more challenging from day to day . <\s>
<s> Your first relationship , your first break-up , your first day of school , your first bad grade , your first car , your first major accident - with all the positive things happening in our youth - you are now confronted new and unkown situations which might prevent you from enjoying life as you did when you were really young . <\s>
<s> And the older you get , the more you think about how easy everything was when you were just a kid ... <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> But is getting old really that discouraging ? <\s>
<s> Does the fact that you might not be able to do everything you want , be it because you are physically `` handicapped '' or your current position in life , prevent you from enjoying life ? <\s>
<s> I think , as you grow older and older , your preferences change . <\s>
<s> Activities like going to clubs or playing around and being physically successful do not define your life any more . <\s>
<s> At a certain point of time , be it the retirement-age , different things make you feel content and happy . <\s>
<s> Seeing your own children grow up , spending time with people that are close to you or just being able to be a `` good advisor '' to the younger generation might become ways to make your day . <\s>
<s> Since life has become more and more stable and changes dont happen that quickly anymore , you get the chance to view life in a totally different way and thus you become able to benefit from different things and enjoy your life . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In my opinion not the age but your own character , your own `` soul '' define wether you can enjoy life or not . <\s>
<s> Even the richest man or a child that gets everything it can possibly imagine might be the sadest and loneliest people in the world . <\s>
<s> Whether you are old or young , rich or poor - happiness and the ability to enjoy your life are not mainly influenced by external facts - what really plays a role is the person you are and how you see life itself . <\s>

<s> Others , on the other hand , prefer to memorise facts rather than trying to understand concepts . <\s>

<s> In History class for example , learning about events and facts is more important than understanding them , it is even impossible to understand some issues in history . <\s>

<s> First of all , it should be made clear what we intend with broad knowledge and specific knowledge of subjects . <\s>
<s> If for broad knowledge we imagine the situation of a student that attends spare courses on random subjects like in Sociolgy and Mathematics or in Anatomy and Mass Communicationb whilst for specific knowledge a student that takes courses focused in Social studies , limiting the extension of his study only to courses that are strictly related like Sociology and Antropology , i think i would prefer to have a specific knowledge . <\s>
<s> The reason is that a superficial overview on different subjects can result extremely fragmented and scattered and it can bring the person to be unsure and uncomfortable with all the topics . <\s>
<s> Moreover , without following any structure , the student can be lost in the vagueness and wide-spread extension of knowledge , he could wander from one field to another without catching a concrete point . <\s>
<s> Therefore , i would rather agree more to a specific approach on learning knowledge . <\s>
<s> A specific approach focuses the attention of the student only to some aspects of knowledge . <\s>
<s> This gives to the student confidence with the topic and the skill to treat and work out news insights . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Nevertheless , if for `` broad knowledge '' we intend a structure of courses that follows a project that goes in and out from different sciences , i think i will prefer better a broad knowledge . <\s>
<s> I would explain this idea with an example of a field that is highly related and interconnected with different branches of knoweldge : cognitive science . <\s>
<s> The aim of cognitive science is to discover the functioning of the brain . <\s>
<s> In order to do this the only knowledge brought by Neuroscience will not be enough . <\s>
<s> It needs supports from many other disciplines very different in respect with each others . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Thus , sometime broad knowledge is necessary to have a better glance over topics that are too much complex and that cannot be treated with a specific and focused background . <\s>

<s> I agree with the statement that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today . <\s>
<s> My conviction is based on three reasons . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First , the low birthrate in many countries will cause a sharp reduction in the number of future drivers . <\s>
<s> It is a well-established fact that the largest number of drivers are found in developed countries in North America , Europe and Japan . <\s>
<s> It is also clear that birthrate has been dropping during the past decades in these regions . <\s>
<s> With the reduction of population , there will certainly be a reduction in the number of drivers and cars . <\s>
<s> It can be argued that China is a rising market for cars . <\s>
<s> However , I do not believe that the growth in Chinese market will make up for the loss in other places . <\s>
<s> Besides , the largest number of cars are found in the east coast big cities , where the streets are already jammed with cars and cannot make room to hold more . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Second , the gas shortage will help to reduce the number of cars . <\s>
<s> The energy crisis that we are facing today will also be faced by the next generation . <\s>
<s> Due to the limited energy supply on this planet , people in the future years will define gas shortage as a more serious problem than we do . <\s>
<s> Considering the difficulty of discovering an alternative energy to replace gas , I am convinced that change of numbers of car will be pretty obvious in the near future . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Third , the reduction of number of cars is and will continue to be fueled by people 's rising concern of the environmental issues . <\s>
<s> Over the past decades , people have come to realize that the substances emitted by vehicles will cause an unrevocable damage to our environment . <\s>
<s> With the progress made in our understanding to the earth , it will become even clearer that cars using the currently available fuels will have a long-term , negative effects on the atmosphere and our health . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In summary , I have full confidence that , due to the low birthrate , gas shortage and people 's environmental awareness , there will be fewer cars in the twenty years to come . <\s>

<s> Being 21 years old myself and therefore belonging to the group of `` young people '' I think I can base my evaluation on my own experiences . <\s>
<s> One of the main problems communities have to face is to make `` helping the community '' attractive for young people , especially taking the diversity of other possible activities young people are offered today into consideration . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Most young people rather invest their time into entertainment than in helping their communities neglecting the fact that helping their community can become entertainment , too . <\s>
<s> I experienced a good example of this myself . <\s>
<s> Since I starting thinking I know about a little festival in our suburb of the city of Cologne . <\s>
<s> Everybody knew about the existance of this little festival , but somehow nobody was interested in the organization or marketing of the festival . <\s>
<s> No wonder such conditions led to dramatically decreasing numbers of visitors throughout the years , which made the festival itself of no interest at all for the young population in our suburb because it always had the prestige of being `` boring '' . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> But one day our school principal started a school-wide project called `` Organize a social party '' . <\s>
<s> Initiated by a good friend , some friends of mine and me started to think about an event we could use to organize . <\s>
<s> Then it came to our minds , that it would not be neccessary to invent a new social event at all . <\s>
<s> All we had to do was to do a better organization and better marketing campaign for the existing suburb festival . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Soon we started brainstorming for ideas that could make this community festival more interesting and attractive for young people . <\s>
<s> Quickly a whole bunch of ideas was collected , so for example , a soccer competion called `` Little World Cup '' where little teams of young players represented a country of the world fighting for the world championship . <\s>
<s> Soon everyone in school was talking about this competition and the community festival , too . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The result was an all-time record of festival visitors that year . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> This little personal example shows up how `` helping their community '' can become entertainment and therefore become much more attractive for young people . <\s>
<s> All that it necessary is to show up the attractiveness of improving their community . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> If this can be aim can be achieved I think much more young people will start thinking about becoming active in their community . <\s>
<s> And this , even this may not be the way out of the dilemma at all , it is a important first step to deal with this trend among the young generation . <\s>
