<s> As an Italian citizen working and living within an American environment , after reading your question whether it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts rather than learning facts , the first thing that came to my mind was the difference in the teaching and learning principles that I could identify between the Italian and the American systems . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Until recently , the Italian education system has been focused and built on the importance of theory on practice , to the point of delivering highly educated graduate students that due to the poor or complete lack of practice , experienced a very tough time once out in the work market , trying to get a job . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , what I have seen of the U.S. education system tells me that it is centered more on letting the students learn from facts than from theory . <\s>
<s> Personal experience : my husband is a computer network engineer and I recall his first computer network college book including several chapters explaining the mathematical and physical principles related to issues like band-width and associated data transmission speed . <\s>
<s> Well , knowning that unfortunately my husband has a very poor math and physics background , I asked him how come he ended up getting an A to that class and his answer was really astonishing for me Italian student , used to the Italian education system . <\s>
<s> Basically , my husband told me that their teacher simply told them to skip all the math/physics chapters , because they really did n't need to know why things happened in a certain way , but just the way they worked . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Hopefully , I am sure that not all U.S. college teachers are like the one above that was teaching computer networks to my husband and most likely his case represents just an extreme . <\s>
<s> Nonetheless , I do deem that a little more attention to theory may benefit the U.S. education system , just like more practice would benefit the Italian one . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Basically , in my opinion , `` understanding ideas and concepts '' and `` learning facts '' should be considered as factors equally important to students . <\s>
<s> Actually , to me the ideal education system should contemplate an equal distribution of either learning systems . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , to me the appropriately educated person is the one that knows not only how things happen ( learning facts ) , but also why the world runs the way it does ( understanding ideas and concepts ) . <\s>

<s> Despite the fact that each people has his own way of learning and understanding , in a general point view , I think that best results can be obtained by focusing on ideas and concepts . <\s>
<s> That does not mean , however , that facts should never be dealt with . <\s>
<s> The best way is certainly finding a compromise between the two approaches . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Ideas and concepts are , to my opinion , the most important part of learning , like the foundations of a building which is growing bigger and bigger . <\s>
<s> Theory is the first brick you can build on . <\s>
<s> Moreover , ideas and concepts tend to be universal - I think a good theory is evaluated to its degree of universalism . <\s>
<s> In a way , we could say that theory precedes the facts in that it aims at explain , and sometimes predict them . <\s>
<s> Therefore learning and understanding ideas and concepts is important because it permits to think from a general point of view , without being tied by circumstancial conditions for instance . <\s>
<s> It gives students ability to adapt to a broad range of situations . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , I think it is not possible to only rely on theory . <\s>
<s> Facts must be used to endorse - or refute - theories and , to my mind , theory alone is worth nothing : everyone can build theories but we should be only interested in ones that have direct links to observable facts , ones that use those facts to give more credibility to the general statements they posit . <\s>
<s> Facts are essential in testing theories since they represents what has actually happened which give them strong credibility and thus they are key elements of a theory 's validation . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> As a conlusion I would say that both are importants - ideas and concepts on one hand and facts on the other hands - because they are part of a general process , they do not exclude each other and one without the other is worth nothing . <\s>
<s> However , I think there could be a chronological aspect : it would probably be more effecient to work on ideas and concepts before dealing with facts . <\s>

<s> I think it is better to specialize in one specific subject and be an expert on that subject than to have broad knowledge of many subjects and not have a specific area of expertise . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Having broad knowledge of many subjects does not necessarily show that one is qualified . <\s>
<s> That sort of knowledge can easily be acquired through personal effort and experience , which makes it almost the same thing as what we call ` general knowledge` . <\s>
<s> General knowledge is the accumulation of one 's experience and learnings gained through education and/or quite simply , living . <\s>
<s> Everybody has a general knowledge to some extent , and this knowledge does not bring any bonus points to you in the course of your professional life , no matter how vast it is , especially in an age as competitive as ours . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , specializing in one particular subject gives you the opportunity of being unique . <\s>
<s> There is no limit to how much you can learn and discover on any subject . <\s>
<s> Therefore , it is possible for someone who has chosen to specialize , to go as far as he or she wants with his or her studies , research , experiments , etc . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Let us take the profession of conference interpreting as an example . <\s>
<s> It is a must for each and every conference interpreter to have broad knowledge on many academic subjects , since they could be hired to work in many conferences regarding many subjects . <\s>
<s> It is not possible for them to interpret what they hear if they do not understand anything , or if they are not familiar with the particular terminology . <\s>
<s> Nevertheless , this certainly does not mean that they are experts , or in other words , that they have specialized in those subjects . <\s>
<s> This does not mean that they are not experts in any subject either . <\s>
<s> What this means is that they are specializing in conference interpreting , and that without their expertise in that particular area , their abilities to simultaneously listen and talk , their knowledge of interpreting techniques , their broad knowledge on many subjects would not do them any good . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , in an environment as competitive as the current one , where you have to stand out in order to be able to achieve certain standards in your life , you can not just settle for a broad knowledge of many subjects . <\s>
<s> You certainly have to have your area of expertise , an area where you are unique , and where you are willing to pursue that `` uniqueness '' to the furthest extent possible . <\s>

<s> In conclusion , I think it is equally important for one to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects and to specialize in one specific subject . <\s>
<s> Some people think that it is more important for students to understnad ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts . <\s>
<s> However , I believe students need to learn facts rather than ideas amd concepts . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> First of all , students can learn what they should do or should not do from facts . <\s>
<s> When they learn consequences of a certain fact , they will know that the fact should be done again or not . <\s>
<s> For example , if students learn about wars , they will know that people should not fight each other again . <\s>
<s> Since students wll learn that wars cause so many deaths from the wars which occured in the past , they would think that wars are not acceptable . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Second , while Ideas and concepts can be very complicated and difficult to understand , facts are easy to understand . <\s>
<s> For instance , when students learn the concept of `` dilemma '' , they may not understand the meaning completely . <\s>
<s> However , if they learn examples of `` dilemma '' , they would understand easily and deeply . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Finally , facts are related to real life . <\s>
<s> Therefore , students can match their experience with the facts they have learnt . <\s>
<s> As a result , they can predict what will hapen next and prevent bad consequences . <\s>
<s> For example , there was a huge earthquak in Japan and a lot of people died becase furniture in the house hit them . <\s>
<s> If students learn about that , they can prevent it from happning again by attaching furniture to walls . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In conclusion , facts provide students with more useful information than ideas and concept does . <\s>

<s> Most of the advertisements are making the products seem much better that the observer of the information does not realize the consequences of using or buying the product may cause . <\s>
<s> Best examples for these types of advertisements are cosmetic products , such as wrinkle fixing creams , and , alcohol . <\s>
<s> When the aim is to make product seem much better . <\s>
<s> the company does not mention about the condictions of usage or side effects of theproduct may cause . <\s>
<s> Mostly , cosmetic products creates effective changes when they are used for a specified amount of time and in terms of continuous usage . <\s>
<s> However , in the advertisement , with a change of scene , the improvement may be observed in an exagerrated manner . <\s>
<s> Besides , the side effects that the product may cause are not shown or told in the advertisement ; in presenting the drinks containing alcohol , there is just a small caution written as ` Dr'nk Responsively` , however , people may not observe a person on the screne , who has a tremendous headache and feeling discomfortable in the stomach . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , some of the advertisements does not reflect the benefits that the product will bring . <\s>
<s> These types of advertisements lack giving relevant information because of the legal issues , while the government provides several restrictions for obtaining a fair competition between the manufacturers of the similar products . <\s>
<s> In a conferance , it has been told that for a specific brand of shampoo , achieved reduction of loss of quality of hair was in higher quantity that has been indicated in the advertisement , while administrative board of advertising has certain rules for idetification of improvements . <\s>
<s> Also , this understatement of improvements cause loss of reliability on the product , and company loses the profit that may be obtained from improvements . <\s>
<s> So , there is a trade-off for preparing advertisements with respect to the borders that laws specify . <\s>

<s> Finally , there are no limitations for misguiding people about the benefits of a product , but there are certain rules that should be obeyed , when preparing an advertisement . <\s>

<s>  <\s>
<s> This means that nowadays companies believe that having a good product is not enough , but that you must make the public aware of your product and convince it of how good your product actually is . <\s>

<s> Simply because such an approach would n't make most products stand out in the wide varierty of products now available . <\s>

<s> Most of them must be making their products seem much better than they really are . <\s>

<s> But clearly , products have weak points and disadvantages . <\s>

<s> In my opinion , a good education system should always start with the understanding of ideas and concepts rather than with the learning of the facts . <\s>
<s> This is true from the very beginning of your education to the end of your academic life . <\s>
<s> When you start your studies at the primary school you are just a child , often unable to link the facts the teacher is trying to teach you , in a more complex grid . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> The substructures of this grid are ideas and concepts . <\s>
<s> Although it might appear easier to learn facts before understading the ideas lying behind them , this way of teaching always leads to a lack of background structures and , therefore , to a lack of understanding : children will learn facts by heart , yet they will be unable to collect them into a coherent structure , hence failing their tests . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> While a way of teaching focused on the understanding of ideas and concepts is the best choice for primary education , it can be really useful even in secondary and tertiary education . <\s>

<s>  <\s>
<s> Why those former students , who never received an education based on facts , are so successful in the work life ? <\s>

<s>  <\s>
<s> To sum up , an education based on the understanding of ideas and concepts is a better choice in order to develop a grid of thought that enables you to vary between many different disciplines . <\s>

<s> Small firms or the firms that are unable to cope with the competitive environment are omitted or forced to leave the arena . <\s>
<s> The firms survived were not necessarily the big ones but the clever ones to adopt strategies to sell their products such as pampering the qualities of a product in the ads . <\s>
<s> This method has proven its efficiency since we observe the products in advertisements lacking realistic representations . <\s>

<s> The result is that in recent years the number of cars used has increased spectacularly . <\s>
<s> But , will this trend continue in the following years ? <\s>

<s> On the other hand , there are a big and powerful industry which will make hard to abandon the systems based on fossil fuels . <\s>
<s> In my opinion , the current situation is bad enough to compell society to offer alternative solutions to this problem which will result in the decrease of the number of cars . <\s>

<s> To begin , the amount of fossil fuels available is decreasing very rapidly . <\s>
<s> Therefore , some time in the future will be no oil or gas . <\s>

<s> This opens up a bunch of alternative possibilities to provide another means of transportation different from cars . <\s>

<s> This include enhance the use of public transportation , foster the use of bycicles in cities and so on . <\s>

<s> During the last years more and more people are aware that the use of cars contribute highly to the pollution . <\s>

<s> Such measures include restriction in the acces to the center , in the days of the week one can take the car , etc . <\s>

<s> Summing up , keeping in mind all the problems mentioned above , it is clear that the current trend regarding the use of car can not be held . <\s>

<s> Therefore , the number of cars in twenty years will be definitely less than the number of cars used today . <\s>

<s> However , there are still significant opinions claiming for existence of certain game rules which will prevent adviretesements to make products seem much better than they really are . <\s>

<s> First , the ever-growing high competition in almost every market leads advertisements to develop such tactics . <\s>
<s> Given the high density of competitors supplying , to some degree , similar products in the market , embodying some fictional qualities to one of them is a lot cheaper than improving it . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> For instance , taking a bigger , tastier or more delightful picture of an Arby 's or Burger King hamburger ( most of these pictures are competely fictional ) is rather easy and useful to take a better competitive position in the fast food market . <\s>
<s> It probably leads us to go and buy one of these burgers and this is the point when the responsibility of advirtesements ends . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> To solve this problem of false representation of the products in market , it is necessary to have some sort of governmental interventions and regulations . <\s>
<s> For the sake of both consumers ' and competitor firms ' rights , ministry of economic affairs in any given country should have the right and duty of controlling the advirtesement market accordingly . <\s>
<s> As long as we do not have such instruments , fictional products are going to stay \ on our billboards . <\s>

<s> I completely agree to the statement and I strongly believe that in order to succeed one should be willing to take chances/risks in life and try unexplored avenues . <\s>
<s> I 'd like to support my statement by mentioning following points and examples : <\s>
<s> Firstly , as we all know that we have to live once and as some people say that life is not a rehearsal , I think we have been given just one opportunity to explore different avenues of life . <\s>
<s> Indeed life would become very monotonous and boring if risks/chances are not taken and novel things are not tried . <\s>
<s> Having said that it should be taken into consideration that the chance taken should not harm oneself or others . <\s>
<s> For instance , if we think of the big names of business world like Bill gates and Sushil Mittal , they could not have achieved their current status , if they would n't have taken risks in their lives . <\s>
<s> These people were not well acquainted with computers and steel , respectively when they started but because of their willingness to explore and take chance they undoubteldy succeed and reached to the highest level . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Secondly , I believe that if risks/chances are not taken in most of the areas , it would definitely affect the rate at which we invent newer technologies today . <\s>
<s> Most of the advances are based on assumptions that one would succeed while attempting a particular task . <\s>
<s> For example , momentous discoveries like computer , internet , telescope , etc. would not have been possible without taking the risk and considering the possiblity of failures . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Thirdly , I feel that one should be concious of that fact while taking risks/chances that success is not always a surity becasue we always do not get what we aim for . <\s>
<s> So it 's not essentially true that people who took chances earlier are only successful ones , but there are people who were unable to achieve what they desired despite of taking risks . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Finally , I conclude that though there is no harm in working on only doing something that a person knows well , but i think that would make life very stagnant and our advancement will be badly hampered . <\s>
<s> So a person should always be willing to lookout for opportunites and take calculated risks in his life and sooner or later he would definitely taste success . <\s>
<s> Most products , regardless of their brand names , depend on advertisement as a main means of promotion . <\s>
<s> The question is : Are these products as good as they seem ? <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Some of those products have been in markets , and people have been consuming them for long now . <\s>
<s> These products have been able to maintain their quality and thus their name has survived until these days . <\s>
<s> We still even repeat their brand names , which proves that quality has outdid any role of advertisement <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> On the other hand , some new products have emerged , and manufacturers have tried their best to draw a resemblance between different products . <\s>
<s> Nowadays , if you are watching a commercial on TV , you can hardly notice the difference between products . <\s>
<s> They look the same , the way the product is introduced would also sound familiar to you . <\s>
<s> For example , in their commercials , they depend on showing the best of this product by getting it featured by a good looking model ! <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> Once the audience view the commercial , he / she would temptingly go and try out the product . <\s>
<s> But the problem that we are facing nowadays is that some products are not as good as they seem . <\s>
<s> TV , newspapers , computer , and other means have facilitated some ways to make all of these products look just perfect ! <\s>
<s> So people would go , buy or try some of these products , and later get disappointed by the results or the outcome . <\s>
<s>  <\s>
<s> In my own opinion , I think that there should be certain committees to be held responsible for the quality of any product , especially when it comes to advertisement . <\s>
<s> They should make sure that the quality of products would look as real as it seems ! <\s>
<s> Technology has a major role in making these products look better , but definitely it should not determine our judgment , insult our intelligence , or deceive our eyes ! <\s>
